name: Depressed People's Welfare Association
briefDescription: DPWA is a registered NGO which has for over 25 years rendered yeomen service in the fields of housing for homeless, rehabilitation of handicapped and blind, care of the orphan and neglected children, mother and child health care, organisation of women SHGs, income generation activities for the rural poor communities, education of children belonging to marginalised poor communities, provision  of protected drinking water facilities for the needy village communities, care of the destitute and elderly, eye care and community devt.

address: Indira Nagar, Vinayagapuram, Mullal Po, Lalgudi Tk,
